articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq end lower on first day of August in busy earnings week
articles.description: Among pharmaceutical heavyweights, Pfizer edged lower in choppy trading after the drugmaker's quarterly revenue fell short of Wall Street expectations, hit by declining sales of its COVID19 products.
articles.content: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq closed weaker on Tuesday, the first day of seasonally slow August, ahead of U.S. jobs data and major companies' earnings reports later this week.U.S. stocks ended July on a… [+2486 chars]
